com.topcoder.commons.utils

类 ParameterCheckUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topcoder.commons.utils.ParameterCheckUtility

  • public class ParameterCheckUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that provides static methods for checking whether some parameter value meets specific criteria (not null, not empty, positive, negative, etc). If criteria is not met, this utility throws IllegalArgumentException. Thread Safety: This class is immutable and thread safe when collection parameters passed to it are used by the caller in thread safe manner.
    作者:
    yangxuelian

      • checkNotNull

        public static void checkNotNull(java.lang.Object value,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is not null. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown.
        参数:
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is null

                                 java.lang.String name)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        参数:
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is empty

        public static void checkInstance(java.lang.Object value,
                                 java.lang.Class<?> expectedType,
                                 java.lang.String name)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is an instance of the specified type. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note that if value is null, exception is thrown.
        参数:
        expectedType - the expected type of the value
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is not an instance of the expected type

      • checkNullOrInstance

        public static void checkNullOrInstance(java.lang.Object value,
                                       java.lang.Class<?> expectedType,
                                       java.lang.String name)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is null or an instance of the specified type. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown.
        参数:
        expectedType - the expected type of the value
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is not null and not an instance of the expected type

      • checkExists

        public static void checkExists(java.io.File file,
                               java.lang.String name)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given File instance points to an existing file or directory. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note that if file is null, exception is not thrown.
        参数:
        file - the value of File parameter to be checked
        name - the parameter name
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given file value represents a not existing file or directory

      • checkNotEmptyElements

        public static void checkNotEmptyElements(java.util.Collection<?> collection,
                                         boolean trimStrings,
                                         java.lang.String name)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given collection doesn't contain empty elements (strings, collections, maps). And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note that if collection is null, exception is not thrown.
        参数:
        trimStrings - true if strings should be trimmed before emptiness check, false otherwise
        name - the parameter name
        collection - the value of collection parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given collection contains an empty element (string, collection or map)

        public static void checkNotZero(double value,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is not equal to zero. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note: Don't forget about "Floating-Point Accuracy/Comparison" problems when checking floating point numbers.
        参数:
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is equal to 0

      • checkGreaterThan

        public static void checkGreaterThan(double value,
                                    double number,
                                    boolean inclusive,
                                    java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is greater than (greater than or equal to, if inclusive is true) than the specified number. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note: Don't forget about "Floating-Point Accuracy/Comparison" problems when checking floating point numbers. Inclusive comparison is recommended to be used with integral types only.
        参数:
        number - the number the value should be compared to
        inclusive - true if "greater than or equal to" check should be performed, false if "greater than" check should be performed
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is not greater than (not greater than and not equal to, if inclusive is true) than the specified number

      • checkLessThan

        public static void checkLessThan(double value,
                                 double number,
                                 boolean inclusive,
                                 java.lang.String name)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is less than (less than or equal to, if inclusive is true) than the specified number. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note: Don't forget about "Floating-Point Accuracy/Comparison" problems when checking floating point numbers. Inclusive comparison is recommended to be used with integral types only.
        参数:
        number - the number the value should be compared to
        inclusive - true if "less than or equal to" check should be performed, false if "less than" check should be performed
        name - the parameter name
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is not less than (not less than and not equal to, if inclusive is true) than the specified number

      • checkInRange

        public static void checkInRange(double value,
                                double from,
                                double to,
                                boolean fromInclusive,
                                boolean toInclusive,
                                java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks whether the given value is in the specified range. And if this condition is not met, the specified exception is thrown. Note: Don't forget about "Floating-Point Accuracy/Comparison" problems when checking floating point numbers. Inclusive comparison is recommended to be used with integral types only.
        参数:
        name - the parameter name
        toInclusive - true if end value is included into the range, false otherwise
        from - the start value of the range
        to - the end value of the range
        fromInclusive - true if start value is included into the range, false otherwise
        value - the value of parameter to be checked
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value is out of the specified range
